apple_vendor_description: This heartwarming emoji on Apple devices showcases a couple, with one woman and one person rendered in a deep, rich dark skin tone, embracing affectionately. The iconic red heart between them glows with a soft, glossy sheen, a hallmark of Apple's vibrant design. Their gentle smiles and the smooth, blended gradients of their figures on Apple devices convey deep love, partnership, and joyful connection.
